name: Super Donald World 2020
description:
Dodge obstacles and build the 1,950+ mile long border Wall across the southern border of the USA while collecting Trumpbux to raise your score!

Build The Wall along the southern border of the United States in this 2.5D side-scroller runner!

Currently Features:

  • A Procedurally Generated 2.5D Environment
  • The Donald
  • The Wall
  • Trumpbux

Currently being worked on and coming by release day:


  • Multiple Difficulties and Challenge Modes
  • Roaming Enemies
  • SFX and Music
